did.unittitle: Josephine Gomon to Newspapers and Newpaper employees

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Mostly editorial in nature. Includes discussion of the welfare state, tax cuts, living wages, de Gaulle, China, separation of church and state, communism, Eugene McCarthy, women for peace, Catholics, fall-out shelters, John Birch Society, Arthur Holmes, federal aid to private schools, judicial criticism, ACLU, and Vietnam.
